advance().Description: Advances this collection, eg. shows the next view.

fyiWillBeAdvancedByHostKThx().Description: Called by the AppWidgetHost once before it begins to call advance(), allowing the collection to do any required setup.

ClassDesc: This interface can be implemented by any collection-type view which has a notion of progressing through its set of children. The interface exists to give AppWidgetHosts a way of taking responsibility for automatically advancing such collections.
